aboutUs.about_content:
About Us

Estimable Customers of Has Gümüş,

Our first company established in year 2011 at Grand Bazaar which is the traditional gold and foreign exchange market with the name of HAS GÜMÜŞ DEĞERLİ MADENLER DIŞ TİCARET SANAYİ LTD.ŞTİ. had started it’s business life by buying-selling exchangable gold products and buying-selling standard and non-standard gold and silver products. In a short time period, our company expanded it’s portfolio and make a name for itself at Grand Bazaar with service quality provided to it’s customers and increased the turnover with firm steps.

With constantly growing business volume, HAS GÜMÜŞ DEĞERLİ MADENLER DIŞ TİCARET SANAYİ A.Ş. entered into period of institutionalization in year 2013.

Our company has been accepted as member of the BORSA İSTANBUL A.Ş. within the context of reorganization during institutionalization in year 2013. By making Physical Transactions through Borsa Istanbul, our company offered its customers the opportunity to trade gold and silver with physical delivery on a high financial technology infrastructure. Our company continues to provide uninterrupted service in the Grand Bazaar and throughout Turkey.

Our Vision

The principle adopted by our company is to place our company among the respected, honest and reliable companies of Turkey by trading precious metals, primarily GOLD AND SILVER.

Our Mission

It is among our main goals to give importance to our partners,employees, customers, suppliers, society and humanity. It is our duty to be a well-known and respected brand in domestic and international markets and to give the highest satisfaction to its customers.

Our Corporate Values

Adding value to our customers' lives in every aspect is one of our basic working principles.

We are respectful to social values ​​and open to change and development.

We are based on honesty and objectivity in our relations and trade.

Competitive understanding, which takes ethical rules seriously, directs our behavior.

We protect our natural resources and historical heritage and carry them to the future by adding value.

We value learning and teaching as a business policy and continue in this direction.

We adopt the principle of continuous training for our employees and business partners and invest in their future.

We see criticism as an opportunity to learn and we constantly improve ourselves.

We take the opinions of our customers about our products and services at every opportunity and develop solution-oriented behaviors.

We value our employees, we believe in everything we do, we base our relationships on love and respect, and we are passionate about our work.

We act with the awareness that we have social responsibilities towards the society we live in, and consider supporting education among our primary goals.

Our Activities

HAS GÜMÜŞ DEĞERLİ MADENLER DIŞ TİCARET SANAYİ A.Ş.HAS GÜMÜŞ DEĞERLİ MADENLER DIŞ TİCARET SANAYİ A.Ş. is making IMPORT, EXPORT, purchase and sale of worldwide accepted JEWELLRIES like GOLD,SILVER, PLATIN, PALADIUM, BRONZE, MARKAZITE and similar VALUABLE PRECIOUS METALS and products manufactured from them, and other works written in the articles of association of the joint stock company, with the permission and authorization given by the Republic of Turkey Undersecretariat of Treasury. In addition, our company carries out the trade, import and export of unprocessed & unworked standard or non-standard precious metals (gold, silver, platinum) all over the world. Our company is a member of the Diamond and Precious Stones Market as well as being a member of the Istanbul Gold Exchange (IAB).
